description: After months of speculation and rumors and waiting, Apple unveiled the Phone 5. (You probably heard.) So did the announcement live up to expectations? What should consumers be aware of as far as their own contracts and their own situation goes before they make this jump? And what is the iPhone-less T-Mobile doing to entice customers? (Hint: BYOP)
itags: Marketplace Tech Report for Thursday, September 13, 2012
title: Marketplace Tech Report for Thursday, September 13, 2012
